name: Malediction
overview: Formerly, in the world of Sortilia, there was a Stone of Power, entrusted to the Supreme Mage. But one day a demonic being called Xanthior took hold of this stone of power. This stone gives its owner much heightened magical powers, which Xanthior used to his advantage. Sortilia quickly sank into terror... Horedes of monsters, each more terrifying than the next, devastated the whole country. The mage was imprisoned by Xanthior in the dungeons of his terrifying fortress. The only way to defeat this evil being was to destroy it and the Power Stone. Only the mage knew how to defeat him. It was therefore necessary to free him and annihilate Xanthior.
